label: FreeHandUni
name: freehanduni
description: The free-hand recognizer extends the $P gesture recognizer to 3-D gestures for unipath single stroke gesture. It is derived from the FreeHand recognizer pseudocode which extends the 2D gesture recognizer $P++.

settings.label: Number of sampling points
settings.name: samplingPoints
settings.description: The number of points of the gesture after resampling.

settings.label: Path
settings.name: points
settings.description: The path that is used by the recognizer.
